detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Pattern-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, wrapover skirt in imitation leather with concealed elastication at the waist, a visible zip at the back and decorative gathers at one side.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and jersey-lined drawstring hood with a ribbed edge. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
GP & J BAKER x H&M. Trousers in a patterned crêpe weave with a high, elasticated waist, decorative ties, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Metal rings. One smooth ring and eight in various designs.
Short dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Narrow, detachable belt at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with satin lapels, a chest pocket with a decorative handkerchief, and flap welt front pockets. Button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waistband.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved dress in slub jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High profile boots in imitation leather with chunky platform soles, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a V-shaped, mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Pouch bag in soft, transparent, printed plastic with a zip at the top. Size 22x32 cm.

Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip and earphone outlet at the top, long raglan sleeves with ventilating mesh sections and thumbholes at the cuffs, and reflective details. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Plastic party glasses with glittery appliqués and no lenses.

Padded bomber jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and a shimmering print motif front and back. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Cotton jersey lining.
Jumper in soft, airy, fine-knit merino wool with a small stand-up collar, decorative hole-knit sections, extra-long sleeves and roll edges around the collar, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-4Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in a rib-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
Tailored trousers in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a concealed zip in one side and fake back pocket. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases, and short slits at the hems.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Scarf in a soft, airy, patterned weave.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems. Coin pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets and a fake back pocket.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in organic cotton jersey with buttons down the front and pockets at the sides. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather covered with glistening sparkly stones. Flap with a press-stud and a narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap with a trigger clasp at each end. One inner compartment containing six card compartments. Lined. Size approx. 3x9x12 cm.
Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Pyjamas with a top and bottoms in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with narrow elastication at the waist and hems.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back, long, wide sleeves with smocking and a small frill at the cuffs, and a skirt with gathered tiers. Lined.
Sandals in soft leather with narrow straps at the front and long, narrow straps that tie around the ankles. Leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Short jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Warm-lined, waterproof boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, a zip at one side and loops at the top. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Ballet pumps in glittery fabric with embroidery and appliqués at the front, an elasticated strap containing glittery threads over the foot and a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a flap and magnetic fastener, and a narrow shoulder strap at the top. Lined. Size 4x16x23 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders. Tapered fit at the hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Bikini top in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top and a lined front with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Asymmetric seam under the bust, a wide elastic trim at the hem and mesh racer back with a chunky zip.

Sandals in imitation leather with a lightly padded top edge and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Wide strap over the foot with appliqués and an adjustable hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and patterned soles.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a viscose blend with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases and easy-access flap pockets.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back, decorative crossover straps at the back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fitted top in soft jersey with flounced cap sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave. Round neckline with decorative gathers at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Wide, cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the back and ribbing around the neckline. Relaxed fit.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps. Press-studs at the top and crotch (except in sizes 9M-4Y), and short legs with narrow ribbed trims.

Long blouse in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Bomber jacket woven in a nylon blend with a stand-up collar that has a decorative zip and tab with press-studs. Zip down the front, a chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a concealed press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and narrow shoulder straps.
High-waisted jersey leggings.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with imitation suede side panels. Narrow shoulder strap, a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Size approx. 12x19x24 cm.
Cargo trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized shirt jacket in sturdy twill with a brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, and a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back. Welt front pockets and flap chest pockets with a button. One of the chest pockets has a Kangol logo. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Quilted lining made from recycled polyester.
Trainers in mesh with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Flared top in soft jersey with an elasticated neckline, flounce that continues over the shoulders and overlocked edges.
Bodies in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps and a high cut at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim made from an extra soft, shape-retaining Tencel™ lyocell blend. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Long nightshirt in a cool, patterned viscose weave with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
